name: Working Parent
description:
Avoid using the ESC key when playing the HTML5 version - it causes the pointer to leave the window! Also note that the HTML5 verison's graphics are washed out and a little buggy due to issues with Godot and GLES3.

How long can you keep both your boss and your baby happy? Once your baby's happiness meter runs out or you fail to complete two work tasks it's game over! Fight against the clock and try to keep your sanity.

Keys:

  • W A S D - Movement Keys
  • E - Use key. Pick up and throw baby and bottles. Use computer
  • Esc - Close current email or computer

Baby Needs:

  • Baby needs to be changed at upstairs changing table
  • Baby needs to have nap in upstairs crib
  • Baby is hungry - grab bottle from the kitchen fridge and throw it at the baby
  • Baby is lonely - try to be around the baby as much as possible!
